original_title: Senta no Meu, Que eu Entro na Tua
overview: Explicit sex comedy divided into two episodes. In "Alô Buça!", A woman discovers that her vagina speaks and has her own opinions and desires but puts her in embarrassing situations; In "The Unicorn," an impotent man sees his sexual capacity doubling after a penis is born in his head and this leads women to madness.
title: Sit on Mine and I Will Enter Yours
